notifications.toggleRestaurant: Get notified when the daily menu is published
notifications.toggleTraq: Get notified when a new article is available at Traq'

about.title: About
about.description:
We all know that situation when you arrive at the dining hall and realize you should have eaten at home. This has happened to us many times, and that's why we decided to fix it üòº

On Transat, you'll find the dining hall menu updated daily, but that's not all!
No more endless waiting at the laundry room for your machine to finish, get notified when your machine is done üîî

We are Plug'IMT and we're determined to create an app made by students, for students üêô

New features will be added throughout the year to make Transat an essential part of the Nantes IMT campus ü•≥

We hope this app will save you as much as it saved us while we were developing it ü´∂

help.title: Help
help.description:
Any specific question, suggestion or issue?
Let us know using the form below or by joining the Whatsapp group ü´∂
help.requestsDescription: Here are all the requests you've sent to our support team and their status.
help.joinCommunity: Get faster responses from our community
help.subject: Subject
help.subjectRequired: Please provide a short description, it will help us understand your message
help.messagePlaceholder:
Hello, thank you for this amazing app ü§©

When I receive a notification and I click on it, the lunch menu doesn't appear.

Do you have any idea why?
help.messageRequired: You cannot send an empty message
help.messageSent: Thank you for your feedback, we will get back to you as soon as possible!
help.messageFailed: Failed to send your message, please try again later or reach us via WhatsApp
help.imageUploadFailed: Failed to upload image, please try again
help.noRequests: You haven't sent any requests yet
help.faq1Answer: To change your password, go to the account settings and click on 'Change password'. Enter your current password and the new password you want to set.
help.faq2Answer: To delete your account, go to the account settings and click on 'Delete account'. Please note that this action is irreversible and will delete all your data.
help.faq3Question: Is this app made by IMT students?
help.faq3Answer: Yes, this app is developed by IMT students as part of a project to improve the student experience on campus. We are constantly working to add new features and improve the app based on your feedback.
help.faq4Answer: If you want to contribute to the development of this app, you can join our team by contacting us on our WhatsApp group. We welcome any help, whether it's in development, design, or testing.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.sampleText: This is how text will appear in the selected theme.

legal.title: Legal
legal.subtitle: Terms of use and privacy policy
legal.termsDescription: Please read these terms of use carefully before using our application.
legal.acceptanceText: By using this application, you agree to be bound by these terms of use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the application.
legal.userAccountText: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
legal.privacyText: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.
legal.liabilityText: This application is provided 'as is' without any warranties. We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of this application.
legal.modificationsText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the application.
legal.privacyPolicyDescription: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
legal.dataCollectionText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support.
legal.dataUsageText: We use your information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure the security of our platform.
legal.dataSecurityText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
legal.contactText: If you have any questions about these terms or our privacy policy, please contact us through the help section or join our WhatsApp group.

welcome.subtitle: By the Atlantes, for the Atlantes üêô

traq.title: Traq'
traq.about: üç∫ The Traq (Traquenard) is the student bar where you can enjoy various drinks.
traq.additionalInfo: During events, shooters or cocktails may be sold. Please check the event page for more information.
traq.openingHours:
The Traq is open during all parties and special events. 

If you're thirsty and the Traq is closed, you can ask the BDE to open it via WhatsApp.

restaurant.title: Menu
restaurant.noData: There seems to be no data to display
restaurant.closedWeekends: The restaurant is closed on weekends

closedNight.title: The restaurant is closed
closedNight.description: Come back tomorrow to see the menu

closedUpdated.title: We don't have the menu yet
closedUpdated.description: The menu hasn't been updated. Check back later.

restaurant.about: API prepares fresh and homemade dishes daily‚Äîeven the fruit salad! The menu changes every day for lunch and dinner.
restaurant.price: 3.95 ‚Ç¨ for a starter, main course and dessert.
restaurant.additionalInfo: You can exchange a starter for a dessert. Additional dishes are available for an extra cost. Still hungry? Ask the servers! After 7:45 PM, additional food at dinner is free.

olimtpe.title: OL'IMT'PE
olimtpe.description: Your Olympic and sports center at IMT Atlantique. Discover all our facilities and services for an active and healthy student life.
olimtpe.about: üèÖ OL'IMT'PE is the sports center of IMT Atlantique, offering various sports facilities and activities for students and staff.
olimtpe.price: Free access for students with valid student card
olimtpe.additionalInfo: Equipment rental available. Some activities may require advance booking. Check the schedule for opening hours and available activities.
olimtpe.contactInfo: Visit us at the sports complex or check our website for more information

washingMachine.title: Laundry
washingMachine.almostDoneBody: Your {{type}} will be finished in {{minutes}} minutes
washingMachine.getNotificationDesc: You will receive a notification {{minutes}} minutes before your {{type}} is finished
washingMachine.about: Open 24/7, the laundry room allows you to wash and dry at any time. Get notified when your laundry is almost done and check machine availability in real time.
washingMachine.additionalInfo: Pay with coins, card or Monix wallet (recommended for bonuses and refunds). Need more drying time? Pay for multiple sessions before starting.
washingMachine.location: Under the MDE, after the mailboxes

account.photoUpdateNotAvailable: Profile picture upload is not yet available
